comment: Let ` W ` be a vector space, and let ` X ` be a subspace. Then the dimension of ` W ` is the sum of the dimension of ` X ` and the dimension of the quotient space of ` X ` . First part of theorem 5.3 in [Lang] p. 141 (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-May-2023.)
